charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_1201_0100_: Yeeeaaah! You really sent that one flying!
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_1201_0200_: Oh! Hi there, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="mister" F="miss" ]!
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_1201_0400_: Tinkie’s launching rocks with her hammer!
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_1201_0500_: I’ll have her do it again just for you!
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_1201_0600_: OK, Tinkie! Give it all you got!
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_1201_0700_: Whoaaa! That was your best hit all day!
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_1201_0800_: What do you think? My Tinkie’s amazing, isn’t she?
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_1201_0900_: She might be small, but she’s super mighty!
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_1201_1000_:
Wild Tinkaton knock rocks into the sky, too—’cept
they’re usually aiming for Corviknight!
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_1201_1100_: I know everything there is to know about Tinkaton!
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_0401_1400_: Yep! Tinkie and I are reeeaaally close!
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_0402_1600_: Yep! Tinkie and I are joined at the hip!
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_1201_1700_: I care about all of my Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_1201_1800_: but Tinkie is my best friend!
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_1201_1900_:
Whenever I’ve been in trouble in a Pokémon battle,
she’s always helped me out!
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_1201_2000_: When we kept winning battles together...
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_1201_2100_: Geeta and Rika told me I was amazing!
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_1201_2200_: I don’t wanna lose to anyone!
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_1201_2300_:
So I’m gonna become a dependable grown-up!
One who’s super tough like Tinkie!
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_1201_2400_: I won’t lose to you either, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="mister" F="miss" ]!
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_0301_2500_: And I won’t lose to you!
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_0402_2800_: You wanna get a solid victory outta me?
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_1201_2900_: If that’s the case, bring it on, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="mister" F="miss" ]!
charaepi_ch0303_00_poppy/2301_1201_3000_: Tinkie and I will show you how tough we are!
